original_text: All things were made through him, and without him was not any thing made that was made.
korean_text: 만물이 그로 말미암아 지은 바 되었으니 지은 것이 하나도 그가 없이는 된 것이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: All things were made through him
and without him was not any thing made
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 없이는 만들어진 것이 하나도 없었습니다.
